title: Lawsuits filed against Pilgrim's Pride alleging hiring discrimination in Alabama, North Carolina
text:
Published By: Al.com: Huntsville - Today 
Pilgrim's Pride is under fire after the U.S. Department of Labor (DOL) filed two lawsuits accusing the company of discriminatory hiring prac...
